content: 6 15 double_crochet change to pale orange 15 double_crochet to end of round 30 st round 7 change to dark red *2 double_crochet in 1 st 4 double_crochet * 3 times change to pale orange *2 double_crochet in 1 st 4dc * to end of round 36 st round 8-9 change to dark red 18 double_crochet change to pale orange 18 double_crochet 36 st round 10 double_crochet change to dark red 3dc *invdec 4 double_crochet* twice invdec double_crochet change to pale orange 3dc *inv decrease 4dc* twice inv decrease double_crochet 30 st round 11 double_crochet change to dark red 14 double_crochet change to pale orange double_crochet to end of round 30 st round 12 inv decrease change to dark red *3dc invdec* 3 times 2dc change to pale orange *invdec 3dc* 3 times 24 st round 13 double_crochet change to dark red 11 double_crochet change to pale orange 12 double_crochet 24 st round 14 *2dc invdec* repeat ** to end of round 18 st round 15 *double_crochet invdec* repeat ** to end of round 12 st slip_stitch invisible fasten_off stuff head with fibrefill and sew to the body cut two 1x1 5cm ovals of black felt and stick them to the front of the head between row 9-10 with about 2-3 stitches between them use black yarn to embroider a straight stitch between the ovals and dark red yarn to sew eyebrows 3 stitches wide over each one using pale orange yarn sew the ears to each side of the head between rounds 7-10 using bouillon stitch © akabekobotan 2023 hair part a make 2 row 1 ws chain 12 insert hook into 3rd chain from hook working into the back of the chain 5htr 4dc 3dc into first chain working across the remaining loops of the foundation chain 4dc 4htr 2htr in 1 st fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing up part b make 1 row 1 ws chain 14 insert hook into 3rd chain from hook working into the back of the chain 5htr 6dc 3dc into first chain working across the remaining loops of the foundation chain 6dc 4htr 2htr in 1 st fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing up assembling the coif 1 sew both part a pieces directly 2 sew the piece on the right over the against the hairline above the eyes top over the head covering rounds as shown with about one or two 1 and 2 stitches in between them 3 sew the second piece to the side of 4 sew part b in between both part a the first piece pieces a little to the left © akabekobotan 2023 5 sew the end over the two part a 6 using straight stitch fill in the pieces sideburns and sides behind the ears sew the head to the body to complete jacket the jacket is made in black yarn in the same way as the coat in part a but only up to row 12 lapels are made
